Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 89th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1965...
Injured on 8/7/1967 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 4/7/1970 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from New York (A) to Cleveland on 4/28/1970 (Going to NYY: P D. Gullett, P G. Ross. Going to CLE: CF W. Crawford, SS R. Mendez, P M. Lachemann)...

Hit first career homerun on 9/17/1970, off Tom Parsons (TEX)...
